  <script>
  (function() {
    try {
      const isSystemDark = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;
      if (isSystemDark) {
        document.documentElement.classList.add('bg_dark');

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
          document.documentElement.classList.remove('bg_dark');
        });
      }
    } catch (e) {}
  })();
</script>
